author: Katherine Trendacosta
description: As all things old are new again, a bill that would make obtaining bad patents easier and harder to challenge is being considered in the Senate Judiciary Committee. The Patent Eligibility Restoration Act (PERA) would reverse over a decade of progress in fighting patent trolls and making the patent system more balanced. PERA would overturn long-standing court […]
title: PERA Remains A Serious Threat To Efforts Against Bad Patents

author: Tim Cushing
description: 2025 has delivered almost nothing but bad news. Here’s more of that, as first reported by Israeli press outlet, Calcalist: Control of NSO Group is set to leave Israeli hands. A group of American investors led by Hollywood producer Robert Simonds has agreed to acquire the controversial spyware developer in a deal valued at several […]
title: Because Things Just Aren’t Dystopian Enough, Blacklisted Spyware Firm NSO Group Has Just Been Purchased By A Hollywood Producer

author: Mike Masnick
description: Brian Reed’s “Question Everything” podcast built its reputation on careful journalism that explores moral complexity within the journalism field. It’s one of my favorite podcasts. Which makes his latest pivot so infuriating: Reed has announced he’s now advocating to repeal Section 230—while demonstrating he fundamentally misunderstands what the law does, how it works, and what […]
title: Before Advocating To Repeal Section 230, It Helps To First Understand How It Works

author: Tim Cushing
description: At least the last time this many journalists fled an oppressive regime, the military actually offered to give them a ride. That’s not the sort of thing that’s happening these days. In fact, the current administration is more like the current Vietnam government than it would care to admit, especially when it rails against socialism […]
title: Every Legitimate News Agency Leaves The Pentagon Rather Than Agree To Act As Pete Hegseth’s Stenographer

author: Daily Deal
description: The Adobe Acrobat Pro + Microsoft Office Professional License Bundle isn’t around for much longer. It’s a chance to get a 3-year Adobe Acrobat Pro 2024 license and a license for Microsoft Office Pro 2021 for $100. It’s your all-in-one bundle for editing PDFs, creating docs, and working smarter on Windows. Note: The Techdirt Deals […]
title: Daily Deal: Adobe Acrobat Pro + Microsoft Office Professional License Bundle

author: Mike Masnick
description: “The party told you to reject the evidence of your eyes and ears. It was their final, most essential command…. And if all others accepted the lie which the Party imposed–if all records told the same tale–then the lie passed into history and became truth.” —George Orwell, 1984 This past weekend witnessed what may have […]
title: President Denies Reality Of Massive Nationwide Protests While Posting Videos of Himself Dumping Shit On Citizens

author: Karl Bode
description: Whoops! Some Jeep Wrangler 4xe hybrid owners were stranded after the company pushed out a buggy software update that prevented the vehicles from running, and, at least according to one Reddit poster, resulted in the vehicle shutting off in the middle of a highway: “I was driving 65 on the left lane of the highway […]
title: Buggy Software Update Bricks Some Jeep Hybrid Vehicles
